            <entry>cahi1:data_e080909467dc27dd48b4683264ed5f51052be195</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The decay of radioactive uranium atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zerfall der radioaktiven uranium Atome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'affaiblissement des atomes en uranium 
radioactifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A deterioração de átomos de urânio 
radioativos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il deperimento degli atomi uranium radioattivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αποσύνθεση των ραδιενεργών ατόμων ουράνιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El decaimiento de átomos de uranio radiactivos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that when the last of the series of short-lived radionuclides from a radioactive uranium atom decays, it produces stable lead atoms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">half-life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lead atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radionuclides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">uranium atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn das Letzte der 
Reihe der kurzlebigen Radionuklide von einem radioaktiven uranium Atom
verfällt, sie beständige Leitung Atome produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que quand le bout de la
série de radionucléides de courte durée d'un atome en uranium 
radioactif se délabre, elle produit les atomes stables de fil de 
sortie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que quando o último da 
série de radionuclides short-lived de um átomo de urânio radioativo
deteriora, produz átomos estáveis da ligação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che quando l'ultimo 
della serie di radionuclidi di breve durata da un atomo uranium 
radioattivo decade, produce gli atomi stabili del cavo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν παράγει η 
τελευταία της σειράς βραχύβιων ραδιονουκλεϊδίων από 
αποσυνθέσεις τις ραδιενεργές ουράνιου ατόμων, αυτό τα σταθερά 
άτομα μολύβδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que cuando el último 
de la serie de radionuclides de breve duración de un átomo de uranio
radiactivo se decae, produce los átomos estables del terminal de 
componente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitung Atome</string>
          </keyword>
